products.name: Lady-Datejust
products.description: The Rolex Lady-Datejust is a timeless luxury watch designed for women who value elegance and precision. Featuring a classic 28mm case, signature date display with Cyclops lens, and a refined bracelet design, this timepiece blends sophistication with everyday functionality. Crafted with premium materials and powered by a self-winding movement, it offers exceptional accuracy and durability. Perfect for both formal occasions and daily wear.

products.name: Oyster Perpetual 31
products.description: The Rolex Oyster Perpetual 31 stands as the quintessential expression of the world’s most famous watch brand. Distilling a century of horological innovation into a versatile 31mm silhouette, this timepiece is crafted from 904L Oystersteel—a superalloy typically reserved for the aerospace and chemical industries to ensure maximum resistance to corrosion and an exceptional polish. Beyond its striking aesthetic, the watch is powered by the high-performance Calibre 2232, a self-winding mechanical movement entirely developed and manufactured by Rolex. It features a patented Syloxi hairspring in silicon, providing ten times more precision than a traditional hairspring in case of shocks. With its signature waterproof Oyster case and the secure, comfortable three-piece link Oyster bracelet, the Oyster Perpetual 31 is not just a watch, but a lifetime investment in precision and prestige.

products.name: Land-Dweller 36
products.description: Specially designed for this watch, the Flat Jubilee bracelet is a reinterpretation of the emblematic Jubilee bracelet. The Flat Jubilee differs in that all the links are flat, and it merges seamlessly with the Oyster case to form a balanced, harmonious whole, with the alternation of polished and technical satin finishings.Moreover, the top edges of the bracelet's outer links are bevelled, as are those of the middle case, and the resulting chamfers polished, creating the appearance of a continuous ribbon of light. It is equipped with a concealed folding Crownclasp.

products.name: Serpenti Tubogas
products.description: Serpenti Tubogas 103905 automatic watch in 18 kt pink gold with diamond-set bezel white opaline soleil dial and double-spiral bracelet. Water-resistant up to 30 metres Merging two of Bvlgari's most iconic signatures, the Serpenti Tubogas double-spiral automatic watch in 18 kt pink gold blends the snake’s sinuous elegance with the modern essence of Tubogas. The head of the mythical creature is brought to life through a diamond-set case and a white opaline soleil dial, while the mesmerising suppleness of the bracelet evokes the fluid lines of the serpent's flexuous and coiling body.

products.name: Serpenti Seduttori
products.description: Serpenti Seduttori watch 103141 with 33 mm steel case and crown set with a cabochon-cut pink rubellite. White silver opaline dial. Steel bracelet with folding buckle. Quartz movement customized and decorated with Bvlgari logo. Water resistant up to 30 meters.Gleaming with the refined sheen of its materials, the Serpenti Seduttori watch renders time even more precious. Reimagining Bvlgari’s indisputably seductive icon with a striking new design, the timepiece boasts the iconic drop shaped watch head, thinner than ever before, with a sensual, supple bracelet featuring a hexagonal pattern inspired by the scales of a serpent. Alluring aesthetics and a nod to the glamour of high jewellery: the watch casts a spell of seduction on the world of Serpenti. Serpenti Seduttori watch with quartz movement, 33 mm stainless steel case, stainless steel crown set with a cabochon-cut pink rubellite, white silver opaline dial, stainless steel bracelet and folding buckle.Born to make every moment golden, the Serpenti watch is a modern and irresistible of Bulgari’s captivating icon of seduction and glamour. Sinuous, elegant and light, the timepiece bears the iconic drop-shaped watch head with a flexible bracelet featuring the hexagonal pattern inspired by the scales of a serpent.

products.name: Serpenti Tubogas
products.description: Serpenti Tubogas watch 103149 has a Quartz movement with 3 Bar (30 meters) of water resistance, Stainless Steel and Pink Gold case material, White dial colour and Stainless Steel and Pink Gold bracelet.Merging two of the most iconic symbols of Bvlgari's design, the Serpenti Tubogas watch coils the sinuosity of the snake with the contemporary soul of tubogas. Evoking both the sensual curves of a woman and the fluid shape of the serpent, the timepiece is crafted with the shapely lines of this specific technique, with a flexible and tubular litheness. Radiating glamour and a truly individual style, this watch marks a distinctive chapter in the constant evolution of Serpenti. Serpenti Tubogas watch with quartz movement, 35 mm stainless steel curved case, 18 kt rose gold bezel set with diamonds, 18 kt rose gold crown set with a cabochon-cut rubellite, silver opaline dial with guilloche soleil treatment, double spiral bracelet in stainless steel and 18 kt rose gold.A perfect encounter between Italian design, Swiss watchmaking expertise and jewellery savoir faire that proclaimed Bulgari as the Jeweller of Time.

products.name: Carlie
products.description: A gold-tone stainless steel bracelet complements the round gold-tone case, creating a cohesive and polished look. The glossy green dial adds depth with its rich, smooth finish, while sleek hands offer understated functionality. Designed for effortless wear, the curb chain bracelet features an 'Adjust-O-Matic' closure for a customisable fit.

products.name: Carlie
products.description: For an on-trend layered moment, look no further. This stunning set comes with our wear-everywhere Carlie Mini watch featuring our redesigned ‘90s-inspired T-bar and rose gold-tone stainless steel bracelet, paired with a rose gold-tone crystal tennis bracelet with a lobster clasp closure.

products.name: Carlie
products.description: This two-tone watch pairs a gold- and silver-tone stainless steel multi-link bracelet with a coordinating round case for a polished design. The green sunray dial adds vibrant contrast and features a three-hand layout for a clean, modern look. A foldover clasp with push buttons ensures a secure, adjustable fit

products.name: Tissot Everytime
products.description: The Tissot Everytime is an understated, pure and chic timepiece suiting the preferences of modern wearers. The Everytime comes in a variety of dial designs and strap options, allowing you to express yourself. With this Tissot timepiece, every time is your time. Finally, the interchangeable quick release bracelet system offers the possibility to change bracelets without any tool, for maximum versatility.

products.name: Tissot Ballade
products.description: The Ballade COSC is an evolution of a model with deep roots in the Tissot collection — reintroduced in 2024 and now elevated with chronometer-certified performance. At its core is the Powermatic 80 movement, officially recognized for its accuracy and reliability. Its fluted bezel defines the watch’s identity, with finely cut ridges that add depth and character to the case. The Ballade COSC combines certified performance with sharp visual detailing — a watch that carries its precision with presence.

products.name: Tissot Lovely Round
products.description: The Tissot Lovely is a watch of refined elegance and timeless design.All Tissot Lovely watches feature a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal and are powered by a precise Swiss Made quartz movement, so you can keep up with time, day and night. This model features a 316L stainless steel case. A diamond forms the hour markers at 12, 3, 6 and 9 o'clock. The watch also features a bezel set with an additional 42 diamonds for sparkling brilliance. The solid yet flexible 316L stainless steel bracelet holds the Tissot Lovely elegantly and securely on the wrist.

products.name: Golde ellipse
products.description: Patek Philippe has fitted its famous Golden Ellipse with an exclusive bracelet featuring a modern, patented construction. Consisting of fine rows of links reminiscent of chain bracelets, this supple, elegant rose gold bracelet – with an engraved clasp featuring three adjustment notches – pays a fine aesthetic tribute to the 1970s, during which the Golden Ellipse became an iconic model.

products.name: Calatrava Skeleton
products.description: A tribute to the ancestral art of Skeletonizing, this rose gold model is distinguished by its ultra-thin self-winding Caliber 240, entirely openworked, decorated and engraved by hand, with the engraving work alone requiring almost 130 hours. A technical and aesthetic feat in equal measure. The off-centered mini-rotor is engraved with the Patek Philippe Seal.
